abstract: John Chrin, a former high-ranking investment banker at JPMorgan Chase, is one of a handful of top deal-makers who have recently traded the boardroom for the classroom.
snippet: John Chrin, a former high-ranking investment banker at JPMorgan Chase, is one of a handful of top deal-makers who have recently traded the boardroom for the classroom.

headline.main: Executives Inject Real-World Knowledge Into Classrooms
